response.overview: Chance proposes. We blindly commit to its potential, magnetism and instinct. We imagine or project inwardly with eyes closed. What will the result be...? From the steps taken and uncertain intentions, we stumble upon the mysteries of the creative act as we move forwardâ€¦ obstacles to resolve with multiple solutions, an unattainable ideal. An endless, open and unsolvable puzzle... with the spectators as anonymous witnesses, continuing within the spiral.
response.title: Purposes & Expectations
